componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Student did not take any credit bearing activity within allotted Commit to Enroll (ADM) time frame. 

  • Student needs to reapply.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Student did not send in required documents within 6 months of applying (UAO).

Will need to re-apply.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Undergraduate Application was withdrawn before completion. 

  • Student will need to submit a new application if now interested.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Student needs to complete pending enrollment or pending payment plan within 15 days.

  • Status will change to Payment Plan Dropped if enrollment is not completed or payment is not made within 15 days. 
  • At that time, student will need to resubmit enrollment agreement and complete payment. 

Pending payment: 

  • Go to MyExcelsior Account.
  • Click on “My Details”.
  • Go to “My Financial Matters” and select “Pending Payment Plan.”

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Student did not complete pending payment plan. 

  • Student is not enrolled. 

Needs to resubmit Enrollment Agreement and complete payment.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Student needs to complete ID Verification.

ID Verification:

  • In MyExcelsior account go to My Details. 
  • Scroll down to Identity Verification section. 
  • Begin Online Identity verification process.
    • Students have three attempts online. 
    • If Online process does not work, student must Download Identity Verification Form and follow instructions on how to submit officially.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Student needs to complete pending payment & ID Verification.


Pending payment: 

  • Go to MyExcelsior Account.
  • Click on “My Details”.
  • Go to “My Financial Matters” and select “Pending Payment Plan.”

ID Verification:

  • In MyExcelsior account go to My Details. 
  • Scroll down to Identity Verification section. 
  • Begin Online Identity verification process.
    • Students have three attempts online. 
    • If Online process does not work, student must Download Identity Verification Form and follow instructions on how to submit officially.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Student under 18. 

Needs to send a copy of High School diploma and address of High School to records@excelsior.edu

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
WARNING - Non-Matriculated status overrides UAC status in Salesforce. 

  • Important to check SIS to see accurate status. 
  • Status does change at UAO, but will revert back to Non-Matriculated when UAC. 

Best Practice

  • Always check SIS for current status.
  • Set tasks to keep track of student’s progress, especially if they plan to apply or are already UAO.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Non-Nursing UAC 

Check: 

  • UAC date – application only good for 3 months. 

Outreach Strategy:

  • Day 1, day 3, day 7, day 14 and then every other week until month 3. 
  • Adjust outreach if student engages at any point in the process.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
ASN UAC

Check: 

  • Date application was completed- UAC only good for 3 months. 
  • A&P & Micro Expiration Dates.
  • License Expiration Date.
  • State Board Letter (if applicable).
  • Acknowledgement Form.

Outreach Strategy: 

  • Day 1, day 3, day 7, day 14 and then every other week until month 3. 
  • Adjust outreach if student engages at any point in the process.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Non-Nursing AD

Check: 

  • Course Approval on file
  • Financial Aid Interest
  • Most Recent FAFSA on File

criteria.rightValue: Master of Science in Nursing Informatics
Master of Science in Nursing Education
Master of Science in Nurs Leader Admin

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Student is an Excelsior College Graduate.

  • Send to Academic Advisor if seeking another Undergraduate degree.
  • Send to Grad Admissions if seeking Master degree.
  • Application fee is waived for EC grads 

Review Policy 106 for routing details.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Student is on Academic Probation! 

  • Check “On Probation” Date in SIS 
  • May need to limit course approvals
  • May need to adjust dates in SIS
  • Policy 073
  • Link to: https://www.excelsior.edu/policy/academic-probation/

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Student is on Fiscal Hold! May receive any service that does not incur additional charge. Encourage student to speak with Bursar’s Office (6955).

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Encourage this student to register for course work. ADM status is about to expire. 

  • Check Application Date
  • Refer to Policy “Admission, Matriculation and Enrollment” https://www.excelsior.edu/policy/enrollment-and-matriculation/

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
This student is about to graduate

  • Remember to use “Graduation Parameters and LOQ instructions” email template
  • Direct student to pay Graduation Fee on the Student Billing page https://my.excelsior.edu/secapps/StudentBillingService/sbsMain.jsf
  • Discuss how to request a transcript and refer to https://my.excelsior.edu/secapps/TranscriptReq/TranscriptReqPolicy.jsf
  • LOQ can be requested via email to records@excelsior.edu or faxed to 518-464-8646 – must be a signed request, include student ID and where LOQ should be sent. Turn around 2 weeks.
  • Diploma and student copy of transcript will be mailed on the student’s conferral date via USPS priority mail.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Student is within Reactivation window (90 days from withdrawn date).

  • Transfer to Academic Advisor.
  • Will need to pay SSAF and late fee to re-activate enrollment.
  • Will maintain Academic Policy Date if re-enrolled within re-activation window.

Review Policy 106 for routing details.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Student is passed reactivation window (over 90 days from withdrawn date):

  • Transfer to Admissions.
  • Will need to reapply.
  • Will pay an enrollment fee when submitting enrollment agreement.
    • If previously enrolled in Course-based option, student will pay SSAF and re-activation fee as an enrollment fee now. 
  • Academic Policy Date will be based on re-enrollment date, so student will be subject to any degree and policy changes at that time. 

Review Policy 106 for routing details.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Student Failed to complete Identity Verification process within 30 days. 


If still within 6 months from UAC Date, the student will need to submit: 

  • Paper Enrollment Agreement
  • Notarized ID Verification form
  • Multi-Source fee (if applicable)

Note: Students who pay the Multi-Source fee but then become WIV are refunded all but a $50 processing fee.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
NOTE: Student was administrative withdrawn due to failure to meet credit requirement.

  • Enrolled Students are expected to attempt a minimum of 6 credits on an annual basis. Excelsior College credit and/or newly earned credit transferred from approved sources which applies to students’ programs of study will be applicable to the 6-credit minimum. Students who do not meet this expectation will be dismissed from the program.
  • Students must attempt 6 credits – cancels do not count.
  • Students who have been administrative withdrawn due to failure to meet credit requirement (WCA) will be able to re-apply immediately without any appeal process.
  • Review Policy 106 for routing details.

Note: Batch withdrawals occurred in error in July 2019 , verify that this student should have been withdrawn.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
NOTE: Student is either suspended or dismissed

  • Should be forwarded to Academic Advisors to discuss current academic standing and possible appeal process.
  • Student must wait 2 years from date of withdrawal to appeal for reenrollment.

Important to review: 

  • Academic Screen for credits earned
  • Time Limits for degree
  • EC GPA
  • Discuss Financial Aid interest – Some cases of probation may prevent student from receiving aid.
  • Review Policy 073 Academic Probation policy in P&P. 

Review Policy 106 for routing details.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Student was dismissed for one of the following reasons: 

  • Three failures of CPNE 
  • Three failures of FCCA
  • Three failures of same Nursing exam
  • Six cumulative Nursing exam failures
  • Exceeding program time limit


  • Student must wait 5 years from date of withdrawal to appeal for readmission.
  • Student MAY transfer to a different program within 60 days of dismissal (after 60 days must pay multi-source fee & submit enrollment form).

Review Policy 106 for routing details.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Student was dismissed for exceeding degree completion time limit. 

Review Policy 106 for routing details.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Student was dismissed for one of the following reasons: 

  • Three failures of same Nursing exam
  • Six cumulative Nursing exam failures

Review Policy 106 for routing details.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
UG - New Inquiries or Returning BSN or RN-MSN Students:

Review all Eligibility Requirements

  • RN license
  • Associates degree in Nursing (or diploma program with specialty accreditation)

Required for application/enrollment

  • Copy of RN license
  • Transcript from Nursing education
  • NURSYS form
  • RN-MSN also requires Capstone form

visibilityRule.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4) AND (5 OR 6 OR 7)

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
UG - New Inquiries or Returning BSN or RN-MSN Students:

Review all Eligibility Requirements

  • RN license
  • Associates degree in Nursing (or diploma program with specialty accreditation)

Required for application/enrollment

  • Copy of RN license
  • Transcript from Nursing education
  • NURSYS form
  • RN-MSN also requires Capstone form

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
UG - New Inquiries & Returning ASN Students:

  • Review all Eligibility Requirements
  • Licenses
  • TEAS Scores
  • CPNE Wait Time
  • Time Limits on A&P & Microbiology
  • Note on Test Preps (if applicable)

visibilityRule.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
UG - New Inquiries or Returning Health Science Students:

  • Review Time Limits on transfer credit.
  • Students can be awarded credit based on certain licenses and certifications.

visibilityRule.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7)

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
UG - New Inquiries or Returning Business Students:

  • Review Time Limits on transfer credit

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
UG - New Inquiries or Returning Technology Students:

  • Review Time Limits on transfer credit.
  • Review credit for IT Certifications.

visibilityRule.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10)

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
UG - New Inquiries or Returning Technology Students:

  • Review Time Limits on transfer credit.
  • Review credit for IT Certifications.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
New Inquiries or Returning Liberal Arts Students:

  • No Time limits except for Natural Science concentration.
  • Review Time Limits on transfer credit.

visibilityRule.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8)

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Important Info about The Rock Family of Companies (Guild):  

  • Students must first speak with a Guild representative and complete the pre-application through Guild in order to determine eligibility for the program. 
  • Once deemed eligible, student is authorized to begin the application-admitted-enrollment process through Excelsior. 
    • The student must apply for admission (app fee waived) 
    • Veterans may bypass but application preferred
    • Rock FOC reimburses for full tuition and fees
  • The Rock Family of Companies has authorized the following programs for full reimbursement (full tuition and fees): 
    • Business: AAB, BSB, BPB, MBA, MSM 
    • Technology: BCY, BIX, BPT, MCY

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Important Info about Five Guys (Guild):  

  • Students must first speak with a Guild representative and complete the pre-application through Guild in order to determine eligibility for the program. 
  • Once deemed eligible, student is authorized to begin the application-admitted-enrollment process through Excelsior. 
    • The student must apply for admission (app fee waived) 
    • Veterans may bypass but application preferred
    • Five Guys reimburses for full tuition and fees 
  • Five Guys has authorized the following programs for full reimbursement (full tuition and fees): BSB, BPB.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Important Info about Corporate College Services Inc.: 

  • CCS teaches courses at employer sites and we accept those credits, which have been reviewed and approved. 
  • Students have a CCS advisor and an Excelsior advisor.
  • CCS students take 18 credits with us toward the MBA. This includes Economics, Information Technology, 3 electives, and the capstone. 
  • CCS students may also have additional pop codes in their record, such as EdAssist and Scholarship America.

Admissions will provide one course approval for Economics. Grad Admissions will use the Start Term field to indicate which term the student plans on taking courses with us.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Important Info about Spaulding Rehabilitation Network:

  • Students are eligible for direct billing through Spaulding Rehabilitation Network.
  • Students must work with the Spaulding Rehabilitation Network contact (Ellen Fitzgerald) to complete the appropriate direct billing document to be submitted for payment of coursework.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
UG - Simi Institute for Careers and Education

Simi partnership is specifically for Respiratory Care students to concurrently complete their AS in Liberal Arts in the 2nd year of their SIMI program.


To view specific language along with any transfer guides please visit the partnership webpage at: excelsior.edu/partner/simi

criteria.rightValue: Simi Institute for Careers and Education
Simi Institute for Careers and Education

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
UG – Study.com – Working Scholar  

  • Student must complete a minimum of 2 courses to be eligible for partnership 
  • Study.com Working Scholar Pop Code: STUDYWS 
  • Most Working Scholar students will be under 3rd party billing

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
UG – OnlineDegree, Straighterline, Sophia, and Study.com - Transfer 

Student must complete a minimum of 2 courses to be eligible for partnership.

visibilityRule.booleanFilter: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8) AND 9

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
UG - SUNY Broome

SSAF waiver eligible for 3 year under 90/30.

Students must apply, be admitted, and then become an enrolled EC student for waiver to take effect.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
UG - Albany Medical Center

Refer Nursing students to speak with Marie Kaye at the South Clinical Campus on Hackett Blvd for more information and/or documents to apply.


All admissions documents mailed in for Project Learn partnership (nursing) - paper application, enrollment agreement and Tuition Deferral form. 


Students applying for non-nursing can complete regular online application and enrollment.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
UG - Bright Horizons EdAssist Solutions, Edcor Data Services LLC, Scholarship America, Inc.  

Students can use the Tuition Deferral form.

visibilityRule.booleanFilter: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6) AND 7

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
UG - General Electric students:

Renewables employee need to submit Wind Technician training letter.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
UG - UMA students:

Bachelors of Health Sciences is best fit degree.

  • BS in Health Care Management cannot transfer as many credits and Dual degree programs are also not recommended.
  • If student is interested in Dual program, encourage to apply to BS and then speak to their Advisor about switching after they are enrolled and have successfully completed a few courses.  

Note: Students should be encouraged to start at the beginning of each Trimester (Fall, Spring, Summer) and take one course in term I and one in term II to ensure optimal success.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: UG - Most EPCE students will need to send in a NUAP Letter if they have Nuclear Power Plant Training that has been evaluated.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
UG - Pizza Hut Partner Student:

  • Pizza Hut tuition is $250 per credit.
  • Can get credit for training.
  • Review transfer guide here.

Need to collect:

  • Learning Zone ID number (Partner ID)
  • Store ID number (Partner Store ID)
  • Name of Affiliate (Partner Affiliate)

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Important Info about Waste Management (Guild):

  • Students must first speak with a Guild representative and complete the pre-application through Guild in order to determine eligibility for the program.
  • Once deemed eligible, student is authorized to begin the application-admitted-enrollment process through Excelsior.
    • Student must apply for admission (app fee is waived)
    • Veterans can bypass the application process, but it is preferred that they apply
    • Rock FOC reimburses for full tuition and fees
  • Waste Management has authorized the following programs for full reimbursement:
    • AAB, AAT, AS, BPB, BPT, BSB, BCY, BIX 
  • Waste Management has authorized the following programs for partial reimbursement: 
    • MBA, MCY, MSM
  • Guild Coaches (720-378-5452 / help@guildeducation.com)
